price: ߡߊ߬ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ߓߊ߰ ߛߌ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߘߊ߲߬ߠߕߊ߬ߡߌ߲߬ߓߊ߯ ߖߟߎ߬ߡߎ߲߬ߕߐ ߘߊ߬ߡߊ
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
